description: Hyakki Maruo is a surgeon and university professor who was involved in a car accident and lost all four limbs. As a result of the accident, his career was brought to an abrupt halt, as he was forced to resign from the prestigious university where he used to work, eventually becoming a lecturer in the university http://anidb.net/ch78716 [Hazama Kuroo] attends.
name: Hyakki Maruo
